Text: Rar is corrupt, same as the other doom psx game

Don't waste your time with this one folks, there's no seeders - I've been stuck on 25% for a few days now.
Instead, try here - http://www.get-your-rom.com/roms/PLAYSTATION-ROMS/?ROM=Doom-Rom&I=2266
or google "get-your-rom" - you'll find this and many other cool PS1 roms there : )
